title: Bluecreek Ranch
description: Samuel Clemens Morgan and his FBI team are back.  After a shootout gone bad injures all three members of the team, Sam and his team are separated for a time. As Sam tries to recover both mentally and physically, he starts to doubt his faith and what God has planned for his life. Then an unexpected emergency sends Sam and his family out to the family ranch in Montana. Events start taking place which cause Sam to wonder about the safety of his family - and worry--After all these years, have his wife's past enemies finally found her? Other books in the "True Cover" Book 1 - "True Cover" Book 3 - "Second Chances"
author: Ruth Kyser
